name: Solitaire - Golf
description:
Golf is a game of patience, where a lower score is better.
You can play by dragging or double tapping.
Double finger scroll down to show top toolbar on iPhone, double finger scroll up to hide it.

Rules:
One deck of cards are used (52 cards total).

Seven tableau piles of 5 cards each, face up and visible.

Remaining cards (stock) are placed face down (top left of display).

You may move the top card from any tableau (middle right of display) to the discard pile if it is plus or minus one from the current discard card (regardless of suit)

You may not move a card from a tableau to the discard if the discard card is a King

Discards may go up and down again.

You may deal one card from stock to discard at a time.

You may only use the top card from the waste.

You may only go through the stock once.

The object of the game is to move all cards to the discard.

Do you have what it takes to win this game?



Solitaire - Golf
Developed by Dennis Lee of Teraport Solutions Inc
